[Y gwir er gwaethed yw]
5-[50]+ p.
Thomas Jones, [S.l. : 1684]
In verse. Title suggested by Wing. Date of publication and publisher suggested by Wing. Imperfect: pages lacking at beginning and end. For a discussion on how this was identified, see Journal of Welsh Bibliographical Society, Vol. 4, No. 6, July 1935.
